title: Messages dependent on image recognition
content: In this tutorial you will learn how to play voice messages dependent on image recognition.

Select **Text2Speech** to say something using your device's speakers

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Devices/Items/Text2Speech-Item.png)

Scan the QR code with your smartphone.

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/qrscan.png)

Alternatively, click on _Open in this device_ to open it locally.

Do the same with the **SmartCamera** to detect images after custom training using a camera

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Devices/Items/SmartCamera-Item.png)

this will be used to recognize images after training.

With the simple mode option we can recognize one element, with the advanced mode option we can recognize several elements

![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/voice-messages-dependent-on-image-recognition/smart-camera.png)

Gives a name to the image to be recognized

![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/voice-messages-dependent-on-image-recognition/image.png)

Click on record this example to use the current image for training, you can use more images

![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/voice-messages-dependent-on-image-recognition/example.png)

click on learn another image to recognize something else

After finishing the training click on end training <span class=tutorialImgNoBorder>![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/voice-messages-dependent-on-image-recognition/training.png)

Press ![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Logic/Logic.png) on the sidebar,

move the **if** ![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Logic/if-component.png)
and the **comparison** ![comparison](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Logic/comparison-component.png)

components to the workspace

Press ![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Text/Text.png) on the sidebar

and move the **text** ![number](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Text/text-component.png)
to the workspace

Move the **detection** ![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/voice-messages-dependent-on-image-recognition/detection.png)

and the **Text2Speech**
![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/voice-messages-dependent-on-image-recognition/text-to-speech.png)
components to the workspace

Put the components of the previous steps as in the image
![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/voice-messages-dependent-on-image-recognition/blocks.png)
the idea is to evaluate what the camera is detecting, and if it is detecting the image1, say image1 with the text2speech, and in case it does not recognize this image, evaluate if it is detecting the image2, and in this case in an analogous way say image2 with the text2speech.

To be aware of what the camera is detecting, we will use the events, imagine that there is a person watching what the camera captures and when a change occurs, he notifies us to execute the code.

Press ![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Devices/Devices.png) on the sidebar.

Then, move to the workspace the ![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Devices/event-component.png)
component and move the event component

![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/voice-messages-dependent-on-image-recognition/smart-camera-event.png)

and place it as shown in the picture
![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/voice-messages-dependent-on-image-recognition/event.png)
